price: Ya kuwa leo hata masikini mmoja asikuingilieni.
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
